title: 1357 Finley St NE #B
description: Welcome to the Finley Street Cottages! A car-lite community where preservation meets progress in a distinctive collection of homes for everyone. Inspired by the historical footprint of two 1920's Craftsman Bungalows that have been lovingly reimagined, this incredible collection of 1, 2, & 3 bedroom homes effortlessly merges neighborly charm with modern amenities. Intentionally designed to celebrate knowing your neighbors...porches, patios, and matchless common outdoor space abound across every corner of the grounds at the Cottages. Surrounding the shared courtyard, there are two floorplans at this price (one bedroom or two bedroom at the same sq.ft.), each are new construction and designed for with everything needed in mind for folks who are ready to be a part of this unique & amazing community of neighbors. Just a few short blocks from Edgewood Retail & the Candler Park/Edgewood Marta Station & less than a 15 minute bike ride to the Atlanta Beltline, Krog Street Market, Madison Yards, Candler Park, Downtown Kirkwood & MUCH MUCH MORE you'll love the location of your new home as much as the people & the place. Finley St Cottages has multiple units available for any lifestyle and is ready for neighbors to call home!

importantInformation.externalStorage: Not allowed more than 1 car owned by the tenants of the property, and there's a $75 discount for having no cars for this unit (plenty of covered bike & e-bike storage available!)
